column4: does anyone know if there is any real benefit to building your programs from source in apt versus just installing them? other than the fact that the source migth be out before the build?
you would build from source for educational purposes, to learn the process. Other than that, get the package.
: well if apt will be doing the building for me, then im really not learning, i thought it *maybe* would be better configured for my system, thanks

apt has prebuild and pre-configured packages for your system. No need for compilation, so they install fast. Long time ago I did compilations and it was good experience. Now, it's only for special cases (unavailable package, etc).
